attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should have the smoking age down to 16 again, as people who are 16 have to ask older people to "go in the shop" for them and that makes them seem young again. They are still getting cigarette's anyway so what good is coming to us with it up at 18?, It's really silly up at 18 in my opinion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
